definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="Lengthcry" type="Number">Lengthcry</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="68" pinned="false" w="294">This example will test if the current entity type is the player.
